function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through in-person data collection","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among participants and data collectors","Mitigation":"Implementing digital data collection methods, avoiding in-person contact","Technologies":"Digital survey platforms, contactless data collection tools","People":"Participants, data collectors","Owner":"Research institutions, survey organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate sanitation and hygiene during data collection","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease transmission due to poor hygiene practices","Mitigation":"Enforcing strict hygiene protocols, providing sanitation resources","Technologies":"Sanitization stations, touchless equipment","People":"Participants, data collectors","Owner":"Research institutions, survey organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of personal protective equipment (PPE) during data collection","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to lack of protective gear","Mitigation":"Providing PPE to data collectors, enforcing PPE usage guidelines","Technologies":"Masks, gloves, protective clothing","People":"Data collectors, participants","Owner":"Research institutions, survey organizations"}]}
